substeps.plaintext: The Transparent Ruins can be completed in any order.
substeps.markdown: The Transparent Ruins can be completed in any order.

substeps.plaintext: Northeastern ruins: Located northeast of the Mausoleum of King Deshret and northwest of the Hypostyle Desert Statue of The Seven.
substeps.markdown: Northeastern ruins: Located northeast of ◀the Mausoleum of King Deshret▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Mausoleum_of_King_Deshret▷ and northwest of the Hypostyle Desert ◀Statue of The Seven▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Statue_of_The_Seven▷.

substeps.plaintext: Defeat the  Primal Construct: Repulsor x1 on the south side of the ruins to unlock the mechanism to open the door.
substeps.markdown: Defeat the <img:primal_construct_repulsor> ◀Primal Construct: Repulsor▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Primal_Construct:_Repulsor▷ x1 on the south side of the ruins to unlock the mechanism to open the door.

substeps.plaintext: Southwestern ruins: Located south of the Mausoleum.
substeps.markdown: Southwestern ruins: Located south of the Mausoleum.

substeps.plaintext: Enter the ruins from the north side and navigate through the transparent walls.
substeps.markdown: Enter the ruins from the north side and navigate through the transparent walls.

substeps.plaintext: Northwestern ruins: Located northwest of the Mausoleum and southeast of the Garden of Endless Pillars.
substeps.markdown: Northwestern ruins: Located northwest of the Mausoleum and southeast of the ◀Garden of Endless Pillars▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Garden_of_Endless_Pillars▷.

substeps.plaintext: Activate the mechanism in the small room across from the two Replicator Keystones to open the door to the Forged Primal Light.
substeps.markdown: Activate the mechanism in the small room across from the two ◀Replicator Keystones▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Replicator_Keystone▷ to open the door to the ◀Forged Primal Light▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Forged_Primal_Light▷.

substeps.plaintext: Activate the Replicator Keystone on the west (the one at an angle) to create the Everlight Cell.
substeps.markdown: Activate the Replicator Keystone on the west (the one at an angle) to create the ◀Everlight Cell▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Everlight_Cell▷.

substeps.plaintext: After activating the Neverlight Cell, walk past it to the right to reach the exit and the chest.
substeps.markdown: After activating the ◀Neverlight Cell▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Neverlight_Cell▷, walk past it to the right to reach the exit and the chest.

substeps.plaintext: Southeastern ruins: Located southeast of the Mausoleum.
substeps.markdown: Southeastern ruins: Located southeast of the Mausoleum.

substeps.plaintext: Enter the ruins from a hole in the wall on the east side of the ruins.
substeps.markdown: Enter the ruins from a hole in the wall on the east side of the ruins.

substeps.plaintext: Remove a Loose Sand Pile to reveal a mechanism to open the door within.
substeps.markdown: Remove a ◀Loose Sand Pile▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Loose_Sand_Pile▷ to reveal a mechanism to open the door within.

substeps.plaintext: The chest in this ruin does not yield a Transparent Ruin Record but must still be opened to complete the quest.
substeps.markdown: The chest in this ruin does not yield a Transparent Ruin Record but must still be opened to complete the quest.
